content.subject: software standard
virtual observatory
content.description: VOSpace is the IVOA interface to distributed storage. This version extends the existing VOSpace 1.0 (SOAP-based) specification to support containers, links between individual VOSpace instances, third party APIs, and a find mechanism. Note, however, that VOSpace-1.0 compatible clients will not work with this new version of the interface.
